     169                 :            :   *

     171                 :            :   *

     173                 :            :   *   - any scalar type (2D),
     174                 :            :   *   - any matrix expression,
     175                 :            :   *   - any type based on RotationBase (e.g., Quaternion, AngleAxis, Rotation2D)

     177                 :            :   * Currently toRotationMatrix is only used by Transform.
